text: Nikita Konstantinovich Kalugin (; born 12 March 1998) is a Russian football player who plays as centre back for PFC Sochi. ==Club career== He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Dynamo-2 Moscow on 28 July 2016 in a game against FC Domodedovo Moscow. He made his debut in the Russian Premier League for PFC Sochi on 13 July 2019 in a game against FC Spartak Moscow. ==International== He represented Russia national under-17 football team in the 2015 UEFA European Under-17 Championship. ==Club career== ===Career statistics=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=3|FC Dynamo Moscow |2014–15 |rowspan=2|Premier League |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |2015–16 |0||0||0||0||colspan=2|–||0||0 |- |2016–17 |National League |7||0||0||0||colspan=2|–||7||0 |- |FC Dynamo-2 Moscow |2016–17 |Professional League |10||0||colspan=2|–||colspan=2|–||0||0 |- |rowspan=2|FC Dynamo Moscow |2017–18 |Premier League |0||0||1||0||colspan=2|–||1||0 |- !colspan=2|Total !7!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!8!!0 |- !colspan=3|Career total !17!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!18!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Profile by Russian Professional Football League Category:1998 births Category:People from Krasnoselsky District, Kostroma Oblast Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Dynamo Moscow players Category:Russia youth international footballers Category:Russia under-21 international footballers Category:PFC Sochi players Category:Russian Premier League players
